posts.post_content:
I would like to trade this T206 EDDIE COLLINS SGC 30 straight up for an equivalent EDDIE COLLINS in a PSA holder. 

My collection is entirely PSA and for continuity reasons I feel obligated to keep it that way...so rather than resubmit for regrading (which for a single card would apparently run nearly $30) I would rather trade.

I only have a scan of the front here at work but can add a back scan later. It is a clean back though.

Thanks,
Andy
